Alteration 6

Hellscape

EA, MA, LA Abysia

Ritual
F4
spell id [id]: 663
effect number [effect_number]: 42
damage [damage]: 16
range [provrange]: 5 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 10F
Affect Province with Anonymous Event:Unknown
Cannot target geo mask : (Sea)
The caster calls on the fires of Rhuax to curse a distant province with blistering heat. Smoke and wildfires will erupt as the very ground will burn with unnatural heat. The Hellscape will appear as an unnatural event, but those affected will not know who has cast the curse upon them.
Heat Scale +3, Death Scale +1, Population -10%, Unrest +20.
